properties.entry: select /* $reportUser.userName */ /*+label($!reportMetadata.environment$$!reportMetadata.reportType$$!reportMetadata.reportName$$!dim)*/ t.publisher_id as publisherId, c.name as publisherName, sum(t.revenue) as totalRevenue, sum(t.revenue_gross) as grossRevenue, sum(t.revenue_net) as netRevenue, sum(t.revenue_gross) - sum(t.revenue_net) as costOfSales FROM fact_revenue_adnet_vw_daily t INNER JOIN dim_company c ON c.id = t.publisher_id WHERE t.revenue_gross > 0 AND t.tag_owner = 1 AND (t.revenue_net <> t.revenue_gross) AND t.start >= :start AND t.start < :stop GROUP BY t.publisher_id, c.name ORDER BY c.name
